dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
ExtUtils::MakeMaker - Create a module Makefile. This utility is designed
to write a Makefile for an extension module from a Makefile.PL. It is
based on the Makefile.SH model provided by Andy Dougherty and the
perl5-porters.
dependencies.name: perl-extutils-makemaker

dependent_to.description: The Ensembl Variation Perl API and SQL schema.
dependent_to.name: perl-bio-ensembl-variation

dependent_to.description:
STAR-Fusion is a component of the Trinity Cancer Transcriptome Analysis
Toolkit (CTAT). STAR-Fusion uses the STAR aligner to identify candidate
fusion transcripts supported by Illumina reads. STAR-Fusion further
processes the output generated by the STAR aligner to map junction reads
and spanning reads to a reference annotation set.
dependent_to.name: perl-star-fusion

description:
Set::IntervalTree uses Interval Trees to store and efficiently look up
ranges using a range-based lookup.
name: perl-set-intervaltree

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
